SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Computer Science?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Computer Science is arc {Engineering}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Health Sciences?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Health Sciences is arc {Engineering}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Health Sciences} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Computer Science} has the largest input flow.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Health Sciences?
SC.A: The total flow output from Health Sciences is {1351}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 427? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {1008} from {Health Sciences} to {Computer Science}, a flow of {511} from {Computer Science} to {Health Sciences}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 296? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {249} from {Engineering} to {Health Sciences}, a flow of {213} from {Engineering} to {Computer Science}, a flow of {165} from {Computer Science} to {Engineering}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 231 and 296? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {249} from {Engineering} to {Health Sciences}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Health Sciences to Engineering or from Computer Science to Health Sciences?
NC.A: The flow from {Computer Science} to {Health Sciences} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Engineering to Computer Science, from Computer Science to Engineering, or from Health Sciences to Computer Science?
NC.A: The flow from {Health Sciences} to {Computer Science} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Health Sciences}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Computer Science} and {Health Sciences}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Computer Science, Arc Health Sciences, Arc Engineering}.
